metadata.name: Without You II
metadata.description:
The two themes - gradients and glass - proclaim a struggle of vulnerability and self-development. 

Without You is the continuation of an abstract series first explored by Hard on June 4th 2021. This is an experiment with gradients, texture, and shapes to create minimalistic compositions.

For more information follow me on Twitter @HardArchitects.

Without You II
3840 x 5120 px
